bibl.title: "All Army Boots and Uniforms?" Ethnicity in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993
bibl.author: DELIA, Diana

bibl.note: The nature of ethnicity in Alexandria from the late fourth to the early second century B.C.
bibl.seg: DELIA Diana, "All Army Boots and Uniforms?" Ethnicity in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993 (Malibu, 1996) pp. 41-53.
